items.name: init(gradient: Gradient, center: UnitPoint, angle: Angle)
items.desc: Creates a conic gradient that completes a full turn.

items.name: init(colors: [Color], center: UnitPoint, angle: Angle)
items.desc: Creates a conic gradient from a collection of colors that completes a full turn.

items.name: init(stops: [Gradient.Stop], center: UnitPoint, angle: Angle)
items.desc: Creates a conic gradient from a collection of color stops that completes a full turn.

items.name: init(gradient: Gradient, center: UnitPoint, startAngle: Angle, endAngle: Angle)
init(colors: [Color], center: UnitPoint, startAngle: Angle, endAngle: Angle)
items.desc: Creates an angular gradient from a collection of colors.

items.name: init(stops: [Gradient.Stop], center: UnitPoint, startAngle: Angle, endAngle: Angle)
items.desc: Creates an angular gradient from a collection of color stops.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.
